t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Is Amazon a natural habitat for designer brands? | The Drum
s: November 6, 2020 - Amazon has quickly become a one-stop-shop with its easy-to-use platform and arguably the biggest inventory, available at the tap of a button. But key to Amazon’s success has been its exceptional ability to deliver pretty much anything in a very short amount of time, across the world.
